summary: A musical prodigy rises to Christian music fame and fortune only to walk away and live on a Navajo reservation.
cast: Michael Koch|David Leo Schultz|Mel Fair|Carson Aune|Elizabeth Roberts|Christie Brooke|Cameron Goodman|Mitch McVicker|James Kyson|Wolfgang Bodison|Charles Lawlor|Amy Schultz|Bill Clem|Michelle Keller|Dave Mullins|Clark Mahaffey|Jon Mullins|Kacie Mullins|Sam Howard|Taylor St. Clair|Glynn Praesel|William Colquitt|Dale Tino|Debi Kimsey|Ethan Bodie|Elle Bodie|Tony Leon|Steven Puente|Dolan Wilson|Luke Michael Williams|Bill Neenan|John Curran|John Hudson Messerall|Gloria Webber|Don Stallings|Brad Binkley|Jim Smith|Edward Paul Fry|Trini Puente|Gabi Puente|Flora Puente|Emma Bodie|Sarah Cothron|Greg McGlynn|Catie Yodis|Ronnie Johnstone|Dennis Nicomede|William Mortensen Vaughan|Yvette Corporon|Randy Wheeler
title: Ragamuffin
